class.name: LuaAPI
class.brief_description: Execute Lua code at runtime and make your own API.

method.name: do_file
method.description: Loads a file with luaL_laodfile() passing its absolute path.

method.name: do_string
method.description: loads a string with luaL_loadstring() and executes the top of the stack. Returns any errors

method.name: expose_constructor
method.description: Accepts any object that has a new() method. Allows lua to call the contructor aka the new() method. Exposed as a global with the given name.

method.name: function_exists
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] only if [code]LuaFunctionName[/code] is defined in current Lua's state as a function.

method.name: call_function
method.description: Calls a function inside current Lua state. This can be either a exposed function or a function defined with with lua. You may want to check if the function actually exists with [code]function_exists(LuaFunctionName)[/code]. This function supports 1 return value from lua. It will be returned as a variant and if lua returns no value it will be null.

method.name: pull_variant
method.description: Will pull a copy of a global Variant from lua.

method.name: push_variant
method.description: Will push a copy of a Variant to lua as a global. Returns a error if the type is not supported.
